name: otbase-inventory
label: OTbase Inventory
description: Enterprise-grade OT asset management software. OTbase is the gold standard for large scale OT asset inventories. It inventories OT devices from PLCs over network switches to sensors and actuators and integrates nicely with your existing tools and platforms.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the username to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username
fields.tooltip: Specify the username to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the password to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Specify the password to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: PFX Path
fields.description: Specify the path to PFX file(Personal Information Exchange) to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations. Ex: /tmp/{pfx-file-name}
fields.name: pfx_path
fields.tooltip: Specify the path to PFX file(Personal Information Exchange) to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations. Ex: /tmp/{pfx-file-name}

fields.title: PFX Password
fields.description: Specify the password of PFX file(Personal Information Exchange) to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: pfx_password
fields.tooltip: Specify the password of PFX file(Personal Information Exchange) to access the OTbase Inventory server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as False.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as False.

operations.title: Get Devices List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of devices from OTbase Inventory based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the device based on which you want to retrieve devices from  OTbase Inventory.

parameters.title: OT System ID

parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the IP address based on which you want to retrieve devices from OTbase Inventory.

parameters.title: Include Data
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the multiple options to include data in response that this operation returns. You can choose from the following options: Software, Vulnerabilities, Compliance, Modules, Admins, or All.
parameters.name: include
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the multiple options to include data in response that this operation returns. You can choose from the following options: Software, Vulnerabilities, Compliance, Modules, Admins, or All.

parameters.name: networkid
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the ID of the network based on which you want to retrieve devices from OTbase Inventory.

parameters.title: Modified DateTime
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been modified after the specified timestamp. Ex: 2024-04-18 19:12:59
parameters.name: modified
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been modified after the specified timestamp. Ex 2024-04-18 19:12:59

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set as 300.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The maximum number of records to return. By default, this option is set as 300

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The number of detections to skip. By default, this option is set as 0
